context:
Aristotle, an AI system combining formal verification and informal reasoning, achieves top performance on International Mathematical Olympiad problems using Lean proof search, lemma generation, and a geometry solver. We introduce Aristotle, an AI system that combinesformal verificationwithinformal reasoning, achieving gold-medal-equivalent performance on the 2025
International Mathematical Olympiad problems. Aristotle integrates three main
components: aLean proof searchsystem, aninformal reasoningsystem that
generates and formalizeslemmas, and a dedicatedgeometry solver. Our system
demonstrates state-of-the-art performance with favorable scaling properties forautomated theorem proving.
